summary.span: Lo spazio dei nomi fornisce le classi e le interfacce che supportano query che usano Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il Ã¨ lo spazio dei nomi nell'assembly System. core (in System.Core.dll).The namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll). Il classe contiene [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operatori query standard che operano su oggetti che implementano .The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . Il classe contiene [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operatori query standard che operano su oggetti che implementano .The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . Per informazioni su LINQ to SQL, vedere [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
